Detailed Description

cvmx_cpri::_map_k_select_tx#

This register selects which K value is used for each 32-bit segment in the recieve AxC mapping table. Each register selects the K value for 32 segments from 32*[b] to 32*([b]+1)-1.

Note that the K value indicates the number of basic frames spanned by each AxC container block.
